Welcome to Rhema

Rhema is a powerful development coordination and automation platform designed to streamline software development workflows. It provides intelligent conflict prevention, automated refactoring, and seamless integration with your existing development tools.

Key Features

  • Intelligent Conflict Prevention: Automatically detect and prevent merge conflicts before they occur
  • Automated Refactoring: Safely refactor code across multiple files and branches
  • Development Coordination: Coordinate work across teams and repositories
  • CLI Integration: Powerful command-line interface for automation
  • Editor Plugins: Native support for VS Code, Vim, Emacs, and IntelliJ

Quick Start

To get started with Rhema, check out our Quick Start Guide or explore the CLI Command Reference for detailed information about available commands.
